featured.text: His style faithfully conformed to the artistic traditions of his time.

definition.zh_def: 風格；樣式，特定的表現方式或設計。
definition.en_def: A particular way of doing or presenting something, often characterized by distinctive features.
definition.example: Her painting style is unique and easily recognizable.
